S.FORM: iʑo, nɤkinɯ, taʁrdo kha ri, khɯna ci tu.
tɕe khɯna ci tu tɕe, nɤkinɯ iɕqha,
taʁ ri, nɤkinɯ, kha ɯ-taʁ ri ku-rɤʑi ma khɤpa pjɯ-ɬoʁ mɤ-ŋgrɤl.
tɕe fsapaʁ ra nɯ-rca maka ju-ɕe mɤ-ŋgrɤl tɕe mɯ́j-tso.
tɕendɤre nɤkinɯ, khɤpa pa-tɕɤt-nɯ tɕe tɕendɤre, (020)
paʁ ra cho, nɤkinɯ, nɯ-rca ku-rɤʑi tɕe ɲɯ-rga.
tɕendɤre "ɲɯ-ɤnɯɣro-a ra" ɲɯ-sɯsɤm ɲɯ-ŋu ri,
tɕe ɯ-thoʁ ɲɯ-nɤmbɣaʁlaʁ tɕe ɯ-mɤlɤjaʁ tu-sɤrʁɤβjɤβ ɲɯ-ŋu ri,
paʁ ra kɯ ɲɯ-qha-nɯ matɕi, iɕqha khɯna cho paʁ nɯ stu mɤ-kɯ-ɤmɯmi ɕti tɕe,
tɕendɤre paʁ ra kɯ ???mɯ-kú-wɣ-mtsɯɣ ɲɯ-ŋu. (040)
kɤ́-wɣ-mtsɯɣ jamar tɕe tɕe kɤ-ɣɤwu kɯ qhe kɤ-phɣo pjɯ-ɬoʁ ɲɯ-ŋu.
kɤ-phɣo kɯnɤ mɯ́j-nɤz,
ɯ-tɯ-mu kɯ ɲɯ-ɣɤndzɯrndzɯr ʑo. (050)
dɯxpa ɕti ma.
tɕeri nɤkinɯ, nɯ kɯnɤ, khɤxtu nɯtɕu pa pjɯ-ru qhe,
iʑo kha ɣɯ ɯ-fsapaʁ kɯ-ŋu nɯra sɯχsɤl qhe,
nɯra a-pɯ-ŋke-nɯ qhe mucin mɤ-arju. (100)
ɯ-jme ra tu-sɤliɤliɤt ŋu.
kɯmaʁ jilco ra ɣɯ nɯ-fsapaʁ ra a-jɤ-ɣi-nɯ qhe,
tɯrme kɯ-me... /a/ iʑora ju-nɯɕe-j kɯ-me ra kɯ mɯ́j-sɯχsɤl-i ri,
ɯʑo kɯ ɲɯ-sɯχsɤl qhe tɕe tɯrme ra nɯ-fsapaʁ ra khɤpa a-jɤ-ɣi-nɯ qhe tu-ondzɯt ŋu.
tu-ondzɯt nɤ tu-ondzɯt ʑo ŋu.
nɯ kɯ-fse ɲɯ-ŋu, ...
ɲɯ-ɕqraʁ tu-kɯ-ti ri, tɕendɤre "tú-wɣ-nɤɣro-a ŋu" ɲɯ-sɯsɤm qhe,
kú-wɣ-mtsɯɣ ɲɯ-ɕti ri, nɯ ɯ-thoʁ ɲɯ-nɤmbɣaʁlaʁ ɲɯ-ŋu. (130)
ɲɯ-khe tu-kɯ-ti ri, kɯmaʁ fsapaʁ ju-ɣi qhe ɲɯ-sɯrtoʁ qhe tu-ondzɯt ɲɯ-ŋu.
sɤjndɤt, wuma ʑo sɤjndɤt.
@achun ju-nɯɣi tɕe, ɯ-@motuo ɯ-zgra sɯχsɤl.
ɯ-@motuo ɯ-zgra kɯnɤ, kɯmaʁ ra ɣɯ nɯ-@motuo ɯ-zgra cho @achun ɯ-@motuo ɯ-zgra sɯχsɤl.
tɕendɤre kɯ-ɤrqhi jɤ-ɣe tɕe, @achun ɯ-@motuo ɯ-zgra a-pɯ-mtshɤm tɕe,
"jinɤ" tu-ti tɕe chɯ-ɣɤwu ŋu.
kɯmaʁ ra ɣɯ ju-ɣi-nɯ qhe tu-ondzɯt ŋu.
>"a-kɯ-χsu ju-ɣi" ɲɯ-sɯsɤm.
@achun kɯ rca, rɟɤɣi tu-βze qhe, ci ci khɯna ɲɯ-mbi, ci ci lɯlu ɲɯ-mbi ma,
ɯ-βzdɤr kɯ-me kɤ-ndza mɤ-cha qhe. (225)
@achun /kɯ/ cho a-ɣe ni kɯ rɟɤɣi ta-ndza-ndʑi qhe, mɤlɤn ʑo ta-mar pjɯ-tu ra.
tɕe nɯnɯ khɯna cho lɯlu ra rga-nɯ.
@achun tɯ-rɯrɟɤɣi tu-ʑe ʑo qhe, lɯlu ju-ɣi qhe ku-fskɤr qhe ɲɯ-ɣɤwu ŋu.
iʑo ji-lɯlu sɤjndɤt.
maka kɯmaʁ lɯlu ra rcanɯ, ???? (300)
nɯ-mtsɯr-nɯ qhe, "ʁɛ̃nɤʁɛ̃" tu-ti-nɯ ri,
jiʑo ji-lɯlu ki "ʁe" nɯra ma mɤ-ti.
qhe kɯ-xtɕɯ-xtɕi ma mɤ-ndze.
ji-lɯlu-mu nɯ @wokan 我看,
a-ɣe @wusui tɕe tɯrme ra nɯ-ɕki z-jo-ru pjɤ-ŋu tɕe, pɤjkhu tu.
tɕe lɯlu ɯ-ŋgo ɣɤʑu tɕe, kɯmaʁ lɯlu ra pjɯ-si-nɯ,
kɯki lɯlu ɣɯ ɯ-pɯ nɯra kɯnɤ, tɯrme ra kɯ ɣɯ-ju-ru-nɯ qhe tu-ngo qhe pjɯ-si ntsɯ ɲɯ-ɕti ri,
ɯnɯnɯ lɯlu ɯ-mu nɯ pɤjkhu kɯ-tu tɕe, @haishishisannianle 还是十三年了
